# useLongPress

[![NPM](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@aspm/use-long-press?color=%234f97e9&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&style=for-the-badge&labelColor=%2321262d)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@aspm/use-long-press) [![GitHub Tag](https://img.shields.io/github/v/tag/ashkan-pm/use-long-press?color=%234f97e9&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&style=for-the-badge&labelColor=%2321262d)](https://github.com/ashkan-pm/use-long-press/tags) [![CI](https://img.shields.io/github/checks-status/ashkan-pm/use-long-press/master?color=%234ec19d&label=CI&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&style=for-the-badge&labelColor=%2321262d)](https://github.com/ashkan-pm/use-long-press/actions/workflows/release.yaml?query=branch%3Amaster) [![Codecov Coverage](https://img.shields.io/codecov/c/github/ashkan-pm/use-long-press/master.svg?color=%234ec19d&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&style=for-the-badge&labelColor=%2321262d)](https://codecov.io/gh/ashkan-pm/use-long-press/)

Handy React hook for dealing with long-press events with a developer-friendly and highly customizable API.
